2123.subject: POL
2123.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the first semester of Polish. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in POL 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in POL 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in POL 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in POL 201 or 202.
